original_title: Ministry - Fuchi Requiem The Ministry Final World Tour Documentary
overview: Message from Uncle Al "Hey, we worked for days on end getting Ministry's Final World Tour Live DVD and Documentary done. Many bottles of great libations were opened... and imbibed... during the process. By the time it was all over, in our hazy jubilant state, the artwork for each disc got flipped - excuse the hell outta me! It is still the same awesome stuff on there and if you are reading this message you now officially have yourself a Collector's Item!"  Mixed at: 13th Planet Studios, El Paso, TX. Mastered at DNA Mastering Studio City, CA.
title: Ministry - Fuchi Requiem The Ministry Final World Tour Documentary
